00045 struct PWIZ_API_DECL Peak
00046 {
00047     // general peak info
00048     double mz;
00049     double intensity;
00050     double area;
00051     double error; 
00052 
00053     // FT-specific info
00054     double frequency;
00055     double phase;
00056     double decay;
00057 
00058     Peak();
00059 
00060     bool operator==(const Peak& that) const;
00061     bool operator!=(const Peak& that) const;
00062 
00063     void write(minimxml::XMLWriter& writer) const;
00064     void read(std::istream& is);
00065 };
00066 
00067 
00068 PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Peak& pd);

00071 struct PWIZ_API_DECL PeakFamily 
00072 {
00073     double mzMonoisotopic;
00074     int charge;
00075     double score;
00076     std::vector<Peak> peaks;
00077 
00078     PeakFamily() : mzMonoisotopic(0), charge(0), score(0) {}
00079     double sumAmplitude() const {return 0;}
00080     double sumArea() const {return 0;}
00081 
00082     void printSimple(std::ostream& os) const; // TODO: remove at some point
00083 };
00084 
00085 
00086 PWIZ_API_DECL std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const PeakFamily& pd);

00089 struct PWIZ_API_DECL Scan
00090 {
00091     int scanNumber;
00092     double retentionTime;
00093     double observationDuration;
00094     CalibrationParameters calibrationParameters;
00095     std::vector<PeakFamily> peakFamilies;
00096     
00097     Scan() : scanNumber(0), retentionTime(0), observationDuration(0) {}
00098 
00099     void printSimple(std::ostream& os) const; // TODO: remove at some point
00100 };
